divs: Sighting DetailsIn the sky ther were two or more groups of flashing lights that changeddirection randomly. The lights stayed the same distance apart from each other atall times they faded, but were still visible sometimes. When they changeddirection, they took an exact angle, their path did not curve. In the distance aflashing disk was visible.
